definition: Italy/Italian/abbr. for 意大利[Yi4 da4 li4]
to see/to meet/to appear (to be sth)/to interview

sentences.english: I even had a suggestion box at one time.
sentences.chinese: 有段時間我甚至設了意見箱。

sentences.english: I substituted chicken for beef, and awaited comments from the suggestion box.
sentences.chinese: 我等待着來自意見箱的評價。

sentences.english: As a measure of convenience to the customers, a SUGGESTION BOX shall be provided in the banking hall.
sentences.chinese: 爲方便客戶，銀行應在大廳裏設置一個意見箱。
